name: YogaMusicforMeditationandHealing
0:
”Alexa, play yoga music”
”Alexa, start yoga music”
”Alexa, open yoga music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yoga music
des:
Music as Medicine--this deeply relaxing and meditative album features the hypnotic beat of shaman drum, didgeridoo, flutes and Indian Vedic chants. Suitable for meditation, yoga, and as a background for healing. This high quality one hour looping WAV file will soothe your soul and help you relax and focus. We professionally mastered and level matched the audio for the best sound quality. 

You can say:

"Alexa, play yoga music"
"Alexa, start yoga music"
"Alexa, open yoga music"

Send us an email with your suggestions at k@app316.com. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
